evidence.text: Federal grants such as the standard operating grants to the Federation’s members may be terminated per federal statutes and regulations if certain conditions occur. See 20 U.S.C. § 956(f)(7); 2 C.F.R. § 200.240(a). As a prerequisite to termination, however, the statutes require a finding by the NEH Chairperson "after reasonable notice and opportunity to be heard."

extracted.value: Federal statutes (20 U.S.C. § 956(f)(7)) require termination notices to include reasonable notice and opportunity to be heard
